title: Prisoners in Paradise
description: Prisoners in Paradise invites you to visit a beautiful tropical island alive with intrigue, danger, and romance. Just imagine sailing away for a fantastic tropical get away to explore the islands of your dreams. Suddenly your world begins to spin out of control. You find yourself grasping at survival skills you didn't know you had. This kind of exploring gets you more than you bargain for. The romance will take you beyond your own imagination and set you down on a South Sea island where the unbelievable happens.
author: Kathryn Braund
